      • createRules

        public com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.http.ServiceCall<CreateRulesResponse> createRules(CreateRulesOptions createRulesOptions)
        Create rules. Creates one or more rules that you can use to govern the way that IBM Cloud resources can be provisioned and configured. A successful `POST /config/rules` request defines a rule based on the target, conditions, and enforcement actions that you specify. The response returns the ID value for your rule, along with other metadata.
        Parameters:
        createRulesOptions - the CreateRulesOptions containing the options for the call
        Returns:
        a ServiceCall with a result of type CreateRulesResponse

      • listRules

        public com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.http.ServiceCall<RuleList> listRules(ListRulesOptions listRulesOptions)
        List rules. Retrieves a list of the rules that are available in your account.
        Parameters:
        listRulesOptions - the ListRulesOptions containing the options for the call
        Returns:
        a ServiceCall with a result of type RuleList

      • createAttachments

        public com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.http.ServiceCall<CreateAttachmentsResponse> createAttachments(CreateAttachmentsOptions createAttachmentsOptions)
        Create attachments. Creates one or more scope attachments for an existing rule. You can attach an existing rule to a scope, such as a specific IBM Cloud account, to start evaluating the rule for compliance. A successful `POST /config/v1/rules/{rule_id}/attachments` returns the ID value for the attachment, along with other metadata.
        Parameters:
        createAttachmentsOptions - the CreateAttachmentsOptions containing the options for the call
        Returns:
        a ServiceCall with a result of type CreateAttachmentsResponse

      • listAttachments

        public com.ibm.cloud.sdk.core.http.ServiceCall<AttachmentList> listAttachments(ListAttachmentsOptions listAttachmentsOptions)
        List attachments. Retrieves a list of scope attachments that are associated with the specified rule.
        Parameters:
        listAttachmentsOptions - the ListAttachmentsOptions containing the options for the call
        Returns:
        a ServiceCall with a result of type AttachmentList

      • getAttachment
